name: BeamMP Servers on ARM64
author: josdekurk@gmail.com
description: This is the server for the multiplayer mod BeamMP for the game BeamNG.drive. The server is the point throug which all clients communicate. You can write lua mods for the server, detailed instructions on the BeamMP Wiki.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
apt update

rm BeamMP-Server

apt-get install -y tar curl jq file ca-certificates build-essential
apt-get install -y zlib1g-dev rapidjson-dev liblua5.3-dev libssl-dev libwebsocketpp-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev git make cmake g++ openssl


git clone https://github.com/BeamMP/BeamMP-Server
cd BeamMP-Server/
#git reset --hard 28270072
if [ "${VERSION}" == "v3.0.1" ]; then
    echo "v3.0.1"
    git reset --hard 28270072;
else
    echo ${VERSION};
fi
git checkout tags/${VERSION}
git submodule update --init --recursive
cmake . -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
make

mv BeamMP-Server BeamMP.bin
mv BeamMP.bin /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
rm -rf BeamMP-Server/
mv BeamMP.bin BeamMP-Server
chmod +x BeamMP-Server

if [ -f "ServerConfig.toml" ]
then
echo "config file is found"
else
echo "config file is not found --> making one!"
   echo "# This is the BeamMP Server Configuration File v0.60
   Debug = false # true or false to enable debug console output
   Private = true # Private?
   Port = 30814 # Port to run the server on UDP and TCP
   Cars = 1 # Max cars for every player
   MaxPlayers = 10 # Maximum Amount of Clients
   Map = \"/levels/gridmap/info.json\" # Default Map
   Name = \"BeamMP New Server\" # Server Name
   Desc = \"BeamMP Default Description\" # Server Description
   use = \"Resources\" # Resource file name
   AuthKey = \"\" # Auth Key" > ServerConfig.toml
fi


echo "done"
